content: I don't recall this being discussed in the edition planning design-meeting, but there were a couple of comments in the asm rfcs regarding asm macros vs keyword prefixed blocks https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2843#issuecomment-571737194 https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2843#issuecomment-571795282 figured it might be worth bringing up...
